creator: Shares App
descriptionHtml:
Invest from just £1

. Invest in the biggest US stocks from just £1
. Buy fractional shares, with no minimum trade size
. Start with small amounts and build up your confidence

Safe & secure

. We support biometric security (face & fingerprint ID)
. Any sensitive data we hold is stored using symmetric cryptography (AES)
. We use 256-bit TLS encryption to communicate with our servers


See where your friends invest

. See what stocks your friends are buying and selling in real-time
. Comment on their trades or add your reactions
. Create private and group chats to discuss strategies and opportunities
. Find your friends on the app in no time at all

Refer a friend and get £20

. Get £20 to invest for every friend you refer to Shares
. Each friend you refer also receives £20
. Earn up to £1,000 total
T&Cs apply.

Invest in what matters to you

. Create watchlists to easily track the stocks or industries you care about
. Invest in companies you believe in or want to help make an impact
. Buy your favourite stocks and feel good about your decisions

Keep more of your profits

. Buy stocks with zero commission
. Download the app for free
. Pay no platform or custody fees
. Top up with just £1 to get stuck into stocks

Learn how to trade stocks

. Discuss strategies and bounce ideas around with your friends
. See what stocks Shares’ members are buying and find out why
. View your friends’ portfolios and learn from their successes and mistakes
. Keep tabs on your trades and portfolio history, directly in the app

Be part of a community

. Network with a vibrant community of like-minded investors
. Build your bubble of buddies and gather a wealth of ideas
. Get investment confident with the support of fellow members
. See what the community is investing in via the activity feed

See trending stocks

. Find out which stocks are hot with your friends and the wider Shares community
. See what’s causing a buzz across various sectors
. Keep an eye on emerging stocks and new opportunities
. Search for stocks in different industries – from media to renewable energy – in just a few taps

As with all investing, your capital is at risk.

Shares is a trading name of Shares App ltd. Shares App Ltd is an appointed representative of RiskSave Technologies Ltd, which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hey Sharians!

Our latest update makes it even easier for you to explore our stock collections and understand your returns.

Stock collection carousel
Swipe through dedicated title cards for each industry or sector, so you can explore our stock lists with ease.

Dividend breakdowns
Get full visibility of any dividends you receive from your stocks, directly in the app.

Loving Shares so far? Drop us a review and share the love!

Check out these new features in our latest release!

title: Shares - Investing made social

creator: Shares App
descriptionHtml:
Trade stocks and start investing with your friends. Shares puts stock markets at your fingertips and makes investing simple and social.

It’s like Robinhood meets TikTok!

INVEST IN STOCKS FROM JUST £1

• Trade your favourite US stocks from just £1
• Buy and sell part shares, with no minimum trade size
• Invest with small amounts and build up your confidence
• You need to be 18+ to buy shares, but anyone can use our app to chat about trading and finance


SEE WHAT YOUR FRIENDS ARE TRADING

• Follow what stocks your friends are buying and selling in real-time
• Comment on their trades, chat about stock markets and add your reactions
• Discuss how to buy shares and different trading strategies, via private or group chats
• Connect with your friends in no time at all. We’re the online trading app that makes investing social!

SAFE & SECURE TRADING APP

• We support face & fingerprint ID, so you can trade and invest with confidence
• Any sensitive data we hold is stored using symmetric cryptography (AES)
• We use 256-bit TLS encryption to communicate with our servers

REFER A FRIEND, GET £20 TO INVEST

• Get £20 to invest in stocks for every friend you refer to Shares
• Each friend you refer will receive £5 to buy shares
• Earn up to £200 total
T&Cs apply.

INVEST IN WHAT MATTERS TO YOU

• Create watchlists to easily track the stocks or industries you care about
• Invest in stocks you believe in or want to help make an impact
• Buy shares and feel good about your decisions

KEEP MORE OF YOUR INVESTING PROFITS

• Download our online trading app for free
• Buy shares from just £1 and no commission. Other trading fees apply.

LEARN HOW TO TRADE STOCKS

• Trade shares with confidence by discussing tactics with your friends
• See what stocks Shares’ users are buying and find out why
• View your friends’ stock portfolios and learn from their successes and mistakes
• Keep tabs on your trades and portfolio history, directly in the app
• Learn how the stock market works and become better at trading

BE PART OF A INVESTING COMMUNITY

• Meet like-minded folk in our vibrant investing community
• Build your bubble of buddies and learn how to buy shares
• Get investment confident with the support of fellow traders
• See what the community is investing in via the Activity feed

SEE TRENDING STOCKS

• Find out which stocks are trending with your friends and Shares’ investing community
• See what’s causing a buzz across various stock market sectors
• Keep an eye on emerging stocks and new investing opportunities
• Search for stocks in different industries – from renewable energy to female CEOs – in just a few taps

As with all investing, your capital is at risk.
Shares is a trading name of Shares App ltd. Shares App Ltd is an appointed representative of RiskSave Technologies Ltd, which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.
descriptionShort: Learn to invest, chat with your mates and buy stocks from GBP 1, all in one app.

title: Shares - Invest. Learn. Grow.

creator: Shares App
descriptionHtml:
Learn to invest smarter by learning from current investors and trade your favourite companies all in one easy-to-use app.

WHO IS SHARES?
Shares is the all-in-one investment platform that empowers you to become a smarter investor.

INVEST IN OVER 1,500 STOCKS
• Trade your favourite stocks and shares
• Start by investing small and build up your confidence
• Buy and sell fractional shares, with no minimum trade size
• Use auto invest to automatically schedule investments and dollar-cost average into the market
• Buy and hold investing, value investing, growth investing, dividend investing, momentum investing is all possible through the Shares app
• You need to be 18+ to buy shares, but anyone can use our app to chat about trading and finance

SEE WHAT YOUR FRIENDS ARE TRADING
• Whether it’s technology stocks, lifestyle stocks or ethical stocks, follow which stocks and shares your friends are buying and selling in real-time
• Comment on their trades, chat about the stock market and share your thoughts
• Discuss how to buy shares and different trading strategies, via private or group chats
• Share your finance lifestyle with your friends and meet other investors who share your mindset
• Connect with your friends in no time at all. We’re the finance mobile trading app that makes investing social!

SAFE & SECURE TRADING APP
• We support face & fingerprint ID, so you can trade and invest with confidence
• Any sensitive data we hold is stored using symmetric cryptography (AES)
• We use 256-bit TLS encryption to communicate with our servers

REFER A FRIEND, GET £20 TO INVEST
• Get £20 to invest in stocks for every friend you refer to Shares
• Each friend you refer will receive £5 to buy shares
• Earn up to £200 total
T&Cs apply.

INVEST IN WHAT MATTERS TO YOU
• Create watchlists to easily track the stocks or industries you care about
• Invest in stocks and shares you believe in or want to help make an impact
• Filter your investment searches via a company’s performance, market capitalisation, sector/industry and dividend yield, using the stock screener
• Buy shares and start your investment journey

KEEP MORE OF YOUR INVESTING PROFITS
• Download our online trading finance app for free
• Spread the cost of your investments using auto invest
• Buy shares from just £2 and no commission. Trading fees apply.

LEARN HOW TO TRADE STOCKS
• Trade stocks and shares with confidence by discussing tactics with your friends
• See which stocks other investors are investing money into and find out why
• View your friends’ stock portfolios and learn from their successes and mistakes
• Keep tabs on your trades and portfolio history, directly in the easy-to-use app
• Learn how money works within the stock market works and become better at trading

BE PART OF A INVESTING COMMUNITY
• Meet like-minded folk in our vibrant investing community
• Share your own strategies on investing, personal finances and budgeting
• Build your network and learn how to buy stocks and shares
• Get the support of fellow traders and become a better investor
• See what the community is investing in via the Activity feed

SEE TRENDING STOCKS
• Find out which stocks are trending with your friends and Shares’ investing community
• Easily see which stocks are up and which stocks are down
• See what’s causing a buzz across various stock market sectors
• Keep an eye on emerging stocks and new investing opportunities
• Search for stocks in different industries – from renewable energy to female CEOs – in just a few taps

EXPLORE INVESTING COLLECTIONS
• Search for stocks in different industries
• Renewable and clean energy
• Technology stocks
• Dividend paying stocks
• Healthcare stocks
• Financial stocks
• Retail stocks
• Female CEOs

As with all investing, your capital is at risk.
Shares is a trading name of Shares App ltd. Shares App Ltd is an appointed representative of RiskSave Technologies Ltd, which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.
descriptionShort: Invest smarter by learning from current investors. All in one easy-to-use app.
